channels.name: Nate B. Jones
channels.notes: Excellent analysis of AI industry trends, business implications, and predictions. Covers OpenAI vs Anthropic philosophies, job market impacts, and productivity frameworks.

channels.name: IndyDevDan
channels.notes: Deep dives on agentic coding patterns, Claude Code hooks, damage control, and the codebase singularity concept. Essential for AI-assisted development practices.

channels.name: Daniel Miessler (Unsupervised Learning)
channels.notes: Creator of PAI/Kai. Covers personal AI infrastructure, security topics, and AI augmentation philosophy. Key insight: scaffolding is more important than the model.

channels.name: Anthropic
channels.notes: Official Anthropic channel. Developer education on Claude, Claude Code, Model Context Protocol, and AI safety research.

channels.name: Ryan McBeth
channels.notes: Intelligence analyst focusing on disinformation detection, bot farm analysis, and information warfare. Excellent for understanding social media manipulation tactics.
